item.title: Transgender health care must be paid for by state insurance, says an appeals court
item.description: The federal appeals court in Richmond, Va., ruled in favor of transgender patients on Monday. The case was brought by Medicaid recipients in West Virginia and state employees in North Carolina.

item.title: Top British gymnast Ondine Achampong tears ACL, may miss Paris Olympic Games
item.description: Ondine Achampong says she tore her ACL during a bars dismount. The surgery and recovery from the knee injury can take up to a year. She was expected to be a medalist at the 2024 Paris Summer Olympics.

item.title: Elevator or stairs? Your choice could boost longevity, study finds
